text: ⁦@holly_cummins⁩ of IBM talking about Fun in the Workplace at the ⁦@CIOWaterCooler⁩ Live event in London today. As Holly said “Fun is a very serious topic”! Brilliant presentation. Thank you. #gottahavefun https://t.co/NDubNVvx24

author.description: Founder & Principal Consultant of Ethereality Associates, ex CTO Channel 4 Television, Public Cloud evangelist, passionate about Technology, views are my own!
author.name: Bob Harris
